attacks.message: The Bookwyrm uses its power gained from incomplete goals to regenerate 150 HP! Work hard on your goals to make sure the Bookwyrm doesn't strike again!
The Bookwyrm hisses in delight as it regains 5 HP for every power point it had saved up. Don't let it strike again!
The Bookwyrm harvests 200 HP from the uncompleted goals of the Gamified Reading guild. Complete your goals to make sure it doesn't strike again!
@loverofbooks shakes his head sadly as the Bookwyrm yet again regenerates health from uncompleted goals. (+100 HP)
As several Habiticans give up on reading their long tomes, Tedium rejoices and regains 75 HP.
Tedium sneaks 90 HP while Habiticans are taking a "break" from their reading.
Tedium's charms work again and he is able to earn a bonus 100 HP while distracting Habiticans from their reading.
The Reidmorr feeds off of the long TBR lists and regains 50 HP.
The Reidmorr hungrily devours some long TBR lists, regenerating 75 HP.
The Reidmorr regenerates 25 HP from people's long TBR lists. Don't let it strike again!

tasks.name: Read a book from your TBR list

attacks.message: As Habiticans stray away from their reading, Tymeles regains 75 HP.
As Tymeles cracks his whip, Habiticans turn from their reading, giving Tymeles 75 bonus HP.
Distracted by Tymeles's shiny watch, Habiticans fail to notice the 100 HP Tymeles regenerates.
As Habiticans stray back to their banned activities, Tymeles regains 125 HP

list.name: Sqwandyr
list.altReport: Sqwandyr is a semi-permanent challenge and only resets every once in a while. Sqwandyr does not have HP or Power, but each resistance is a victory!

list.name: 2021 Reading Bingo
list.altReport:
You can view the bingo card at https://seewitheyesclosed.com/projects/gamified-reading/finriq/reading-bingo/bingo.png

`Note: The bingo card has been broken; we're working on the problem.`
